and that two -> such : 1
that two such -> alien : 1
two such alien -> forms : 1
such alien forms -> of : 1
alien forms of -> consciousness : 1
forms of consciousness -> can : 1
of consciousness can -> never : 1
consciousness can never -> if : 1
can never if -> this : 1
never if this -> is : 1
if this is -> then : 1
this is then -> only : 1
is then only -> one : 1
then only one -> of : 1
only one of -> them : 1
one of them -> can : 1
of them can -> inherit : 1
them can inherit -> the : 1
can inherit the -> solar : 1
inherit the solar -> it : 1
the solar it -> will : 1
solar it will -> not : 1
it will not -> even : 1
will not even -> the : 1
even the gods -> know : 1
